actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the Government's contribution to the costs of health benefits insurance for Federal employees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the Government's contribution to the costs of health benefits insurance for Federal employees. Sets forth the formula to be used in determining such contributions. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8906(a), 8906(b), 8901(3))

titles.title: A bill to increase the Government's contribution to the costs of health benefits insurance for Federal employees, and for other purposes.
